name: Obstavoid
description:
It's a Bad Game don't know why you would play it, It's a Prototype that I made.

WASD or arrow keys for movement.

try not to touch the red blocks.

the moving obstacles push you to the red blocks so also avoid them.

moving blocks move faster as they pass through the red blocks(they teleport back to the start and become faster)

your movement becomes faster after you die
